item.title: Lasagna
item.description: Ingredients 9 lasagna noodles 1 lb ground beef ½ lb ground pork subst: ¼ lb sausage 8 oz mushrooms (sliced) 1 small onion (diced) 1 tsp fennel seeds (ground) 6 oz can of tomato paste 28 oz can of crushed tomatoes 2 cloves of garlic (minced) 2 inch knob of ginger (minced) 15 oz ricotta 1 egg ¼ cup pecorino romano 8 oz mozzarella cheese not pre-shredded, cheaper is better, feel free to add more salt & pepper vegetable oil (for cooking meat) olive oil (for cooking sauce) Instructions Preheat oven to 375F Cook noodles per box instructions (don’t forget to salt water).

item.title: Garlic Tomato Pasta
item.description: Ingredients (pasta): 120g pasta (spaghetti, dry) Ingredients (sauce): ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 3 cloves of garlic 1 anchovy 12 cherry tomatoes (halved) 1 tsp red pepper flakes ½ tsp pepper ½ tsp salt 1 Tbsp lemon juice shredded Pecorino Romano The Pecorino will be garnish so just grate however much you think you’ll need. You can also add in some chicken. If you do, marinade it with garlic powder, ground ginger, lemon juice, and salt for around 30-45 minutes, cook, and set aside for later.

item.title: Penne Alla Vodka
item.description: Ingredients: 1 lb penne pasta ½ Tbsp extra virgin olive oil 100 g pancetta (can use bacon) 1 shallot (minced) 3 cups (2 cans) crushed tomatoes ⅓ cup heavy cream ⅓ cup vodka Instructions: Go ahead and make the pasta before starting the sauce and reserve ¼ cup of the resulting pasta water. Add olive oil to pan on medium heat. Add pancetta/bacon, let simmer until all the grease has been sweated out.

item.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
item.description: Ingredients (meatballs) ¼ lb ham (minced) 1 lb ground beef 1 tsp ground fennel seeds 1 ¾ tsp sea salt 3 cloves garlic ¼ cup Pecorino Romano (fine shredded) blackpepper (from the hip) ½ cup panko 1 whole egg Ingredients (sauce): ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 4 cloves garlic (thinly sliced) 1 tsp red pepper flakes t tsp salt 1 can (28 oz.) crushed tomatoes 1 bunch of basil You can use 2 cans of crushed tomatoes if you like a lot of sauce.

item.title: White Wine Sauce
item.description: Ingredients (pasta, chicken, and tomatoes): 1 lb pasta 300 g chicken thighs (cut into bite-size pieces) 1 package of cherry tomatoes (halved) ½ tsp salt ¼ tsp pepper Ingredients (sauce): 3 cloves of garlic (minced) ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 5 Tbsp butter (unsalted) ½ tsp crushed red pepper 1 tsp salt ½ tsp ground black pepper ½ cup white wine (your choice thereof) Instructions (chicken and tomatoes): If you’re having this with pasta, go ahead and cook that, chill with water, and set to the side.

item.title: Beef Stroganoff
item.description: Ingredients: 1 lb wide egg noodles (dry) ¼ cup butter (divide into 2) 1½ lbs thin sliced chuck (~¼inch) salt & pepper 1 yellow onion (sliced) 1 lb bella mushrooms (sliced) 4 cloves garlic (minced) ½ cup white wine subst: ½ cup vegetable stock and 1 tbsp white vinegar 2 cups beef stock 1 tbsp worcestershire sauce 3½ tbsp all-purpose flour ½ cup sour cream opt: set aside additional for topping Instructions: Cover meat in salt and pepper.
